name: Swetha
wishText: Some bonds are forever—cherished, celebrated, and held close.
textInChatBox: Thank you for being a part of my sister. I'm not here to intrude, just to send my love and best wishes.
text2: I wondered how best to say it...
text5Content: I simply wish you love, happiness, and endless laughter.
memoryText: Every laugh we've shared, every conversation, every moment of support - they're all treasures in my heart.
wish1: May your path be filled with endless joy and success
wish2: May you always find reasons to smile and celebrate
wish3: May your dreams take flight and soar beyond the stars
wish4: May each new day bring you closer to your heart's desires
finalMessage: Though miles may separate us, you remain close to my heart. Your friendship is a gift I treasure always.
outroText: That's all—no expectations, just a warm wish from the heart.
replayText: Or click if you want to read it again.
